'''Shops''' are run by [[NPC]]s that sell [[Items]] to players. Most shops will restock their wares every day. For a detailed list of the items each shop offers, visit the Vendor's page.

==Special Shops==
Special Shops do not have a physical location in the game. These shops take other currencies besides [[Mora]] and offer many types of items. Players can unlock these shops after completing the [[Archon Quest]] [[Prologue]], Act I: [[The Outlander Who Caught the Wind]] - [[Knights of Favonius (Quest)|Knights of Favonius]].

The Shop Menu can be accessed from the [[Paimon Menu]] or from the [[Wish]] Menu.
